      • getPthreadSelf

        public static long getPthreadSelf()
        It returns the pthread id of the current thread. It never fails.
        Returns:

      • getThreadPolicy

        public static int getThreadPolicy(long pthreadId)
        It returns the scheduling policy of the speficied thread id. If the thread id does not exist, it returns an error (-1)
        Parameters:
        pthreadId -
        Returns:

      • getThreadPriority

        public static int getThreadPriority(long pthreadId)
        It returns the scheduling priority of specified thread id. If the thread id does not exist, it returns an error (-1)
        Parameters:
        pthreadId -
        Returns:

        Returns:
